author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Our first Korea Community Meetup was a huge success!

Over 300 people joined us in Seoul to talk privacy, tech, and the future we’re building.

Here’s a recap 👇 https://t.co/fZFZEohwvi

author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Most “personal” AI agents aren’t personal at all.

They remember everything and monetize it.

@Pindora_HQ challenges that model with nilAI, making privacy the default so your agent serves you.

Introducing our deep dive on PINDORA: The emerging Sovereign Layer 👇 https://t.co/srhjv1Dkic
